snippet: A military coalition led by Saudi Arabia carried out airstrikes and their foes, the Houthi rebels, battled rival militias in several cities.

byline.original: By SAEED AL-BATATI and KAREEM FAHIM

lead_paragraph: A military coalition led by Saudi Arabia carried out airstrikes and their foes, the Houthi rebels, battled rival militias in several cities.

headline.main: U.N. Cease-Fire Fails to Take Hold in Yemen
headline.print_headline: U.N. Cease-Fire Fails to Take Hold in Yemen
